entry.title: Israel Intensifies Gaza Bombing, Targets West Bank Militants With Airstrike
entry.content: Some aid has reached Gaza, but falls far short of what is needed to support the enclaveâ€™s more than two million residents, humanitarian agencies warned.

entry.title: Northern Israel Prepares for Possible War With Hezbollah
entry.content: The prospect of a destructive regional war hinges on whether clashes with Hezbollah on the border with Lebanon can be contained.

entry.title: Americans Back Israel but Are Wary of Getting Pulled Into Conflict
entry.content: A WSJ-Ipsos poll finds more people in the U.S. sympathize with Israelis than with the Palestinian people, although younger Americans are more divided.
